com.amplifyframework.auth.result.step

Enum AuthSignInStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<AuthSignInStep>
      • com.amplifyframework.auth.result.step.AuthSignInStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<AuthSignInStep>

    public enum AuthSignInStep
extends java.lang.Enum<AuthSignInStep>
    Represents the various common steps a user could be in for the sign in flow.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_CUSTOM_CHALLENGE
      Custom multifactor authentication is enabled on this account and requires you to call AuthCategoryBehavior.confirmSignIn(String, Consumer, Consumer) with the input expected by the custom challenge to proceed with the sign in flow.
      CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_NEW_PASSWORD
      The user account is required to set a new password on login.
      CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_SMS_MFA_CODE
      Multifactor authentication is enabled on this account and requires you to call AuthCategoryBehavior.confirmSignIn(String, Consumer, Consumer) with the code sent via SMS text message to proceed with the sign in flow.
      CONFIRM_SIGN_UP
      The user account was signed up but never confirmed.
      DONE
      No further steps are needed in the sign in flow.
      RESET_PASSWORD
      The user account is required to reset its password to be able to login.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_SMS_MFA_CODE

        public static final AuthSignInStep CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_SMS_MFA_CODE
        Multifactor authentication is enabled on this account and requires you to call AuthCategoryBehavior.confirmSignIn(String, Consumer, Consumer) with the code sent via SMS text message to proceed with the sign in flow.

      • CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_CUSTOM_CHALLENGE

        public static final AuthSignInStep CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_CUSTOM_CHALLENGE
        Custom multifactor authentication is enabled on this account and requires you to call AuthCategoryBehavior.confirmSignIn(String, Consumer, Consumer) with the input expected by the custom challenge to proceed with the sign in flow.

      • CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_NEW_PASSWORD

        public static final AuthSignInStep CONFIRM_SIGN_IN_WITH_NEW_PASSWORD
        The user account is required to set a new password on login. Call AuthCategoryBehavior.confirmSignIn(String, Consumer, Consumer) with the new password specified by the user to proceed with the sign in flow.

      • RESET_PASSWORD

        public static final AuthSignInStep RESET_PASSWORD
        The user account is required to reset its password to be able to login. Call AuthCategoryBehavior.resetPassword(String, Consumer, Consumer) and proceed with the reset password flow until complete and then attempt sign in again.

      • CONFIRM_SIGN_UP

        public static final AuthSignInStep CONFIRM_SIGN_UP
        The user account was signed up but never confirmed. Call AuthCategoryBehavior.resendSignUpCode(String, Consumer, Consumer) to get a new sign up confirmation code and then submit that using AuthCategoryBehavior.confirmSignUp(String, String, Consumer, Consumer) to confirm the user's account and then attempt sign in again.

      • DONE

        public static final AuthSignInStep DONE
        No further steps are needed in the sign in flow.
